content: उद्धुर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [उद्गता धूरस्मात्] {@--1@} Freed from a burden or yoke, unrestrained, unchecked, free. {@--2@} Firm, intrepid, bold; अभियोग° <ls>Mv. 6.</ls> {@--3@} Victorious, conquering. {@--4@} High, loud (voice &c); पितरमुद्धुरध्वनिमहाजनानुयातमानीय <ls>Dk. 104.</ls> {@--5@} Heavy, full of; <ls>Śi. 5. 64.</ls> {@--6@} Thick, gross. {@--7@} Lively, cheerful. {@--8@} Able, competent; <ls>Bv. 4. 40.</ls>
